Html:
I am using PHP 5.2.6 and PHPExcel 1.6.4 (downloaded today).

Everytime that I run one of the examples (e.g. 01simple.php) I get the following error:

15:29:39 Create new PHPExcel object
15:29:39 Set properties
15:29:39 Add some data
15:29:39 Rename sheet
15:29:39 Write to Excel2007 format

Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Could not close zip file C:\Documents and Settings\randy\My Documents\Aptana Studio\PHPExcel\Tests\01simple.xlsx.' in C:\Documents and Settings\randy\My Documents\Aptana Studio\PHPExcel\Classes\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel2007.php:383 Stack trace: #0 C:\Documents and Settings\randy\My Documents\Aptana Studio\PHPExcel\Tests\01simple.php(75): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007->save('C:\Documents an...') #1 {main} thrown in C:\Documents and Settings\randy\My Documents\Aptana Studio\PHPExcel\Classes\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel2007.php on line 383

Can you point me in the right direction of how to solve this?

Is there a permission problem?

Any help is appreciated.

Thanks in advance...

Randy

Yes, this looks like the error message you get when the Excel file cannot be saved due to write permission problem. Not sure about your Windows platform. Try to create a separate PHP script that just saves a file on disk. After you get that working then PHPExcel will probably also work.
